about_the_game:
Start your game off right with four exceptional ships, plus a hefty stack of Dilithium! Fly some of the finest ships in the galaxy! Get 1,500 schematics for the legendary Borg Cube and H.M.S. Bounty, 1,200 schematics for the super-rare USS Defiant and USS Enterprise-D, plus 4,000 Dilithium! And don't forget about 2,000 VIP points to unlock elite VIP benefits.


NOTE: DLC will be automatically added to your game the next time you log in after purchase. If you wish to add DLC to an existing STT account, please start STT in Steam and log into your existing account before purchasing DLC.
detailed_description:
Start your game off right with four exceptional ships, plus a hefty stack of Dilithium! Fly some of the finest ships in the galaxy! Get 1,500 schematics for the legendary Borg Cube and H.M.S. Bounty, 1,200 schematics for the super-rare USS Defiant and USS Enterprise-D, plus 4,000 Dilithium! And don't forget about 2,000 VIP points to unlock elite VIP benefits.


NOTE: DLC will be automatically added to your game the next time you log in after purchase. If you wish to add DLC to an existing STT account, please start STT in Steam and log into your existing account before purchasing DLC.

name: Steam Fleet Commander Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32 bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 gigahertz (GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get 1,500 schematics for the legendary Borg Cube and H.M.S. Bounty, 1,200 schematics for the super-rare USS Defiant and USS Enterprise-D, plus 4,000 Dilithium and 2,000 VIP points.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
